subject: Colleges and Universities
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The president of the University of Notre Dame sent an e-mail to students, faculty, staff and alumni Friday saying that the university was responsible for a student videographer’s death because it failed to protect him.
snippet: The president of the University of Notre Dame sent an e-mail to students, faculty, staff and alumni Friday saying that the university was responsible for a student videographer’s death because it failed to protect him.
